Publications & Talks

Journal Articles

Mobile Robot Obstacle Detection and Avoidance with NAV-YOLO

Published in International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research, 2024

Presented at ICCMA 2023 • Received Best Paper Presentation Award

This paper presents NAV-YOLO, a novel approach for mobile robot obstacle detection and avoidance using deep learning techniques. The research demonstrates improved navigation capabilities in dynamic environments through optimized obstacle detection algorithms.

Robotics Deep Learning Computer Vision YOLO

Workshop on Explainable AI in Human-Robot Interaction, ICANN 2024, Lugano, Switzerland
